name: BokRadioLiveStream
0:
”Alexa, open b. o. k. radio”
”Alexa, play b. o. k. radio”
”Alexa, b. o. k. radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. o. k. radio
des:
Live stream of Bok Radio from Cape Town in South Africa. Visit their website at: https://www.bokradio.co.za/. 

Alexa does not always recognise the word "BOK", so for the best results to launch this skill, create a routine in the Alexa app and add your preferred phrase to launch this station (e.g. "Alexa, play B.O.K.").

Terms of use:
The Bok Radio DJs mainly broadcast in the Afrikaans language.
This skill or parts of it may be discontinued at any time and is provided without any guarantees.
The skill might contain errors and might stop to function for reasons outside of the control of the developer. You use this skill at your own risk. 
The developer is not affiliated with the radio station in any way and created this skill purely for the enjoyment of listening to the station. This skill is therefore an unofficial streaming channel for fans of the station.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
